Coord.cc

00001 #include <cassert>
00002 
00003 #include "Coord.h"
00004 
00005 const Coord Coord::ZERO = Coord(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00006 
00014 static double dist(double coord1, double coord2, double size) {
00015     double difference = fabs(coord1 - coord2);
00016     if (difference == 0)
00017         // NOTE: event if size is zero
00018         return 0;
00019     else {
00020         assert(size != 0);
00021         double dist = FWMath::modulo(difference, size);
00022         return std::min(dist, size - dist);
00023     }
00024 }
00025 
00026 double Coord::sqrTorusDist(const Coord& b, const Coord& size) const {
00027     double xDist = dist(x, b.x, size.x);
00028     double yDist = dist(y, b.y, size.y);
00029     double zDist = dist(z, b.z, size.z);
00030     return xDist * xDist + yDist * yDist + zDist * zDist;
00031 }
